column4: So no one has any other suggestions besides "obtain the item you cannot obtain within the next four hours, despite needing it in that timeframe"?
I've never had a smooth install on an MSI motherboard for Linux ... heh
sorry, I just have a really dumb situation here where I can't get my hands on a Gutsy CD, and I've lost my feisty CD, so all I have is Hoary ... and I want to dist-upgrade it :)
